title: CEP CTag Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for Context Tags (CTags). CTags express interpretive, analytic, or contextual facts about CEP records without changing their canonical identity or payload.

terms.label: Potential Shell Entity
terms.definition: Flag indicating that this entity exhibits transaction patterns consistent with a shell organization (for example, funds passing through without operational activity).

terms.label: Cluster Membership
terms.definition: Indicates that the record participates in an inferred cluster (for example, community detection or similarity clustering). The value field typically carries a cluster identifier.

terms.label: Incomplete Address
terms.definition: Data quality flag for records where address fields are present but incomplete for operational or analytic use.

terms.label: Key Actor Highlight
terms.definition: Marks this entity or relationship as a key actor within a specific investigation, story, or analytic report.
